credentialSubject.description: Stores the data of the credential
credentialSubject.title: Credential subject

id.description: Stores the DID of the subject that owns the credential
id.title: Credential subject ID

journeyId.description: Journey ID of when credential was generated
journeyId.title: Journey ID

amendmentsData.title: Amendments Data
amendmentsData.description: Details related to the amendments made to the original data.

data.title: Amendments Data - Personal Details
data.description: Personal details manually amended by the holder/user during authentication process.

firstName.title: First Name
firstName.description: The first name of the credential subject

middleName.title: Middle Name
middleName.description: Middle name of the credential subject

lastName.title: Last Name
lastName.description: The last name of the credential subject

citizenship.description: Citizenship status of the credential subject - ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code (https://www.iban.com/country-codes)
citizenship.title: Citizenship

fullName.title: Full Name
fullName.description: Full name of the credential subject

addressLine1.title: Address Line 1
addressLine1.description: Address line 1 of the credential subject

addressLine2.title: Address Line 2
addressLine2.description: Address line 2 of the credential subject

birthDate.title: Birth Date
birthDate.description: Birth Date of the credential subject in integer format of yyyymmdd, example: 20231226 2023 year, 12-December, 26-day

placeOfBirth.title: Place of Birth
placeOfBirth.description: Place of birth of the credential subject

countryOfResidence.title: Country of Residence
countryOfResidence.description: Country of residence of the credential subject - ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code (https://www.iban.com/country-codes)

postalCode.title: Postal Code
postalCode.description: Postal code of the credential subject

emailAddress.title: Email Address
emailAddress.description: Email address of the credential subject

phoneNumber.title: Phone Number
phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the credential subject

countryOfBirth.title: Country of Birth
countryOfBirth.description: Country of birth of the credential subject - ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code (https://www.iban.com/country-codes)

AuthenticationID.description: The ID of the authentication request

Timestamp.description: The timestamp of the authentication request

ProfileID.description: The ID of the profile used for the authentication request

ProfileName.description: The name of the profile used for the authentication request

originalData.title: Original Data
